title: WHO Condemns Omicron Travel Bans Against Southern African Countries
content:
1. WHO Condemns Omicron Travel Bans Against Southern African Countries  The Daily Beast
  2. Omicron Variant Is Reported in More Countries as Officials Grapple With How to Respond  The Wall Street Journal

  5. World reacts to travel restrictions as new omicron variant spreads  Washington Post
